name: Post Delivery 48 hours Form
description: A form used to capture Post Delivery 48 hours data

alert.message: Temperature is out of range (Normal range 35-37)
Pulse Rate is out of range (Normal range 60-100)
Respiratory Rate is out of range (Normal range 12-16)
Systolic is out of range (Normal range 120-130)
Diastolic is out of range (Normal range 80-85)

answers.label: Sores or Marks along the spine
Baby becomes floppy when lying in certain position

questions.label: Initiated BF in less than 1 hour:
Is the infant well attached to the breast?
Was Bag and Mask ventilation provided:
Was Artificial Rapture of membrane(ARM) done
